item.title: Chapter II: 研究项目
item.description: Beijing mobility The social classes of people have important impact on our behaviors in both the virtual world and physical space. Nowadays, digital media provides a new lens for researchers to investigate people’s allocation of attention in the virtual world and their mobility in the physical space. Using a smartphone dataset of 4125 people, we tried to study how social class influences our moving behaviors in both online and offline space.

item.title: Chapter I: 基本信息
item.description: 徐绘敏，现为南京大学新闻传播学院传播学硕士。计算传播学实验中心成员。研究兴趣是采用计算社会科学的研究视角分析人类传播行为，开展数据驱动的计算传播研究。关注网络科学、社会网络理论及应用，对数据科学和机器学习感兴趣，主要采用Python编程。目前在做的工作主要是基于手机数据的人类注意力流动和移动行为研究。
